com.sdklite.aapt

Interface Chunk

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ChunkType
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChunkHeader, ResourceTable, ResourceTable.Component, ResourceTable.Library, ResourceTable.Package, ResourceTable.Type, ResourceTable.TypeSpec, StringPool, Xml, Xml.CharData, Xml.Element, Xml.EndElement, Xml.EndNamespace, Xml.Namespace, Xml.Node, Xml.ResourceMap, Xml.StartElement, Xml.StartNamespace

extends ChunkType
    Android asset chunk
    Author:
    johnsonlee

    • Field Detail

      • MIN_HEADER_SIZE

        static final int MIN_HEADER_SIZE
        The minimum chunk header size
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getType

        short getType()
        Returns the type identifier for this chunk. The meaning of this value depends on the containing chunk.
        Returns:
        the chunk type

      • getHeaderSize

        short getHeaderSize()
        Returns the size of the chunk header (in bytes). Adding this value to the address of the chunk allows you to find its associated data (if any).
        Returns:
        the header size in bytes

      • getSize

        int getSize()
        Returns the total size of this chunk (in bytes). This is the chunkSize plus the size of any data associated with the chunk. Adding this value to the chunk allows you to completely skip its contents (including any child chunks). If this value is the same as chunkSize, there is no data associated with the chunk.
        Returns:
        the total size of this chunk

      • accept

        void accept(ChunkVisitor visitor)
        Accept the specific chunk visitor
        Parameters:
        visitor - The chunk visitor
